summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting a proffer interview with Christian Perez conducted at the Southern District of New York on August 21, 2019. The interview was attended by federal prosecutors and law enforcement agents. The main body of the document appears to be heavily redacted or contains garbled text, making specific content extraction difficult.

keyFacts: Christian Perez participated in a proffer interview with federal investigators on August 21, 2019.
The interview was conducted at the Southern District of New York and attended by Assistant U.S. Attorneys and FBI personnel.
The substantive content of the interview notes is heavily redacted or garbled in the provided text, preventing detailed analysis of the information Perez provided.
The FBI 302 form was drafted on December 20, 2019, documenting the earlier interview.
